      • getAnnotation

        public static <A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> A getAnnotation(java.lang.Class<?> targetType,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<A> annotationType,
                                                                          boolean includeSuperTypes)

      • getAnnotation

        public static <A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> A getAnnotation(java.lang.reflect.Method targetMethod,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<A> annotationType,
                                                                          boolean includeOverriddenMethods)
        Checks the targetMethod and returns the annotation of the specified annotationType , if present; alternatively check if the targetMethod is an override of some super type method, and checks the annotations on the overridden method if any, when (includeOverriddenMethods is true (not applicable to static methods). Note that overridden methods with generic type parameters are not supported/checked.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the actual annotation type.
        Parameters:
        targetMethod - the method to search annotations on.
        annotationType - the type of annotation to search.
        includeOverriddenMethods - true if check possible overridden methods' annotations as well, when annotation is not found on the targetMethod itself.
        Returns:
        the annotation instance found, or null if none found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when targetMethod or annotationType is null.

      • gatherAllSuperTypes

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> gatherAllSuperTypes(java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
